Amazing dram!


Nose: Raisin, Cherry, Dates, Figs, Chocolate, Currants, Citrus, Tropical Fruit, Almond Pastry, Floral

Palate: Raspberries, Cherries, Chocolate, Plums, Treacle, Hint of Baci, Oak

Finish: long, Cherry, Chocolate, Pepper, Toffee

Best of all 20 euros a pour or 10 euros a half pour
